Package org.neo4j.memory

Class HeapDumpingMemoryTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.memory.HeapDumpingMemoryTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, MemoryTracker
    public class HeapDumpingMemoryTracker
extends Object
implements MemoryTracker
    A memory tracker that monitors the high water mark of estimated heap usage, and allows to set a target value that when reached, either a heap dump will be taken, or a callback fired, or both.

      • getScopedMemoryTracker

        public MemoryTracker getScopedMemoryTracker()
        Description copied from interface: MemoryTracker
        Get a memory tracker that can track sub-allocations and be closed in a single call. Can be useful for collections when the items are tracked, to avoid iterating over all of the elements and releasing them individual.
        Specified by:
        getScopedMemoryTracker in interface MemoryTracker
        Returns:
        The scoped memory tracker.
